verses.roman:
tāṅra upāsanā śuni' prabhu tuṣṭa hailā
āste-vyaste sei vipra randhana karilā

synonyms: tāṅra—his; upāsanā—method of worship; śuni'-hearing; prabhu—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tuṣṭa hailā—was very much pleased; āste-vyaste—with great haste; sei—that; vipra—brāhmaṇa; randhana karilā—began to cook.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu was very much satisfied to hear about the brāhmaṇa's method of worship. Finally the brāhmaṇa hastily made arrangements for cooking.
